abstract: Retailers including Target, J.C. Penney and Home Depot, will report earnings, with a look to the holiday shopping season.
snippet: Retailers including Target, J.C. Penney and Home Depot, will report earnings, with a look to the holiday shopping season.
lead_paragraph: SAC TRIAL Jury selection is scheduled to begin Tuesday in the trial of Michael S. Steinberg, the most senior employee at the hedge fund SAC Capital Advisors indicted in insider trading. Federal prosecutors have accused Mr. Steinberg of trading on secret information about technology companies. Though SAC has been at the center of the government’s insider trading investigation for years, Mr. Steinberg is the first former SAC employee to stand trial. Six others, including the fund itself, have pleaded guilty.

headline.main: Economic Reports for the Week of Nov. 18
headline.print_headline: Economic Reports for the Week of Nov. 18
